description: This is the ID that corresponds to the user of plugin.
name: id

description: The gender of the user : 'm' - male; 'f' - female; 'o' - other.
name: gender

description: The gender specification for users who identify neither as male or female.
name: gender_specify

description: The age range of the user.
name: age

description: The postcode of the user's address
name: postcode

description: The income bracket of the user.
name: income_bracket

description: The level of education of the user.
name: level_education

description: The spoken language of the user.
name: language

description: The language specification for users who do not speak one of the languages indicated on the registration form.
name: language_specify

description: The employment status of the user.
name: employment_status

description: The political party preference of the user.
name: party_preference

description: The political party specification for users who do not align with any of the provided political parties on the registration form.
name: party_preference_specify

description: The time (as a UNIX 'seconds' timestamp) at which this user account was created.
name: created_at

description: This is the activation code of the user.
name: activation_code
